TopicTitle: Choose your super power, then have it trivialized

Articles.Content:
You then age significantly faster than us everytime you use it (since you actually sped up your time that everything outside looked frozen).

The ability to control gravity.

But the gravity becomes far from what you want.

Telekinesis

you can't it control and explode

Ferrokinesis

you can't it control and explode

Ferrokinesis

what iz dat

what iz dat

In other words: Magneto.

BOT: Until at one point you go insane and decide to wrap yourself in a metal casket.

The ability to be intangible.

You know what I'm getting at.

I would choose the power of shape shifting. Mythological creatures to be specific.

*snip*

I would choose the power of shape shifting. Mythological creatures to be specific.

But you would also get the mind of the creature you shift into, thus losing your free will.

Immortality

you fall into a volcano and live in pain for all eternity

Cryokinesis

You accidentally freeze yourself.

The ability to become invisible and visible at heart

your heart becomes invisible which causes confusion among doctors that are trying to perform heart surgery on you which causes you to die

selective precognition
WTF is that?!

when you see some thing cool you always shout "WTF IS THIS" no matter what happens

I Would be a Super genius MacIver person

You become ridiculously bored due to lack of challenge in doing ANYTHING.

Invulnerability to Dalek gunstick fire.

daleks kill you with their suction cups not their gun

A SUPER MacIver genius who can never get bored

You run out of challenges.

Have the ability to teleport.

U teleport into the sun.

being myself (try to crack this)

you are murdered by random people who can't stand you being yourself

pyrokinesis

you accidentally burn yourself

Rockets with double delta-v

you point the rockets in the wrong direction and blow yourself up

ergokinesis (if any of you don't know what this is i will laugh)

you accidentally delete your lungs.

Mind control

you can only mind control ants

summon an infinite swarm of locusts

you can only mind control ants

summon an infinite swarm of locusts

That immediately fly away into eternity.

Export dreams to a computer

The files self-degrade within ten nano-seconds of export.

Being extremely rich.

Super-robbers steal all your money

Indestructability

You are only indestructable when being shot by a pop gun.

being normal.
